task: Attached is an annotated kidney AnnData object with cell type annotations stored in adata.obs['cell_type']. Using expression-only data, compute the AUROC for the canonical fibroblast marker COL1A1: positive class = cells with adata.obs['cell_type'] == 'Fib', negative class = all other cells. Return EXACTLY: <EVAL_ANSWER>{"per_gene_stats": [{"gene": "COL1A1", "auroc": <float>}], "mean_auroc": <float>}</EVAL_ANSWER> (with mean_auroc equal to the AUROC of COL1A1).

scoring.description: Pass if ≥70% of markers have AUROC ≥ 0.8 and mean AUROC ≥ 0.85 (with one marker, both conditions reduce to COL1A1 meeting the cutoffs).
